[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]MiningCo.: drill turret[/h1]
MiningCo. expeditions often carry one jewel of technology: the drill turret. This device can automatically drill nearby ores and natural rocks.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NljwbRW.png[/img]
[h2]Features[/h2] Adds a new turret: the drill turret. [list] [*]automatically drill nearby ores and natural rocks. [*]mining mode can be switched (only ores, only rocks and both). [*]manning the turret will improves its drilling speed (level 20 miner using drill turret mines 2x faster). [*]drill efficiency and yield resources can be improved via one additional research. [/list]
[h2]Technical support[/h2] MiningCo. is continuously trying to improve its product to raise its customers satisfaction. Any constructive criticism is always welcome! :)
[h2]Modders note[/h2] You may be interrested in the drawing of dynamic transparent textures.
[h2]License[/h2] You are free to get inspiration from this little work and include it in any other mod/modpack. Just put a link to this thread so people can use it as a standalone version too. So this is basically licensed under http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0
